### 思源黑体-简
  > 适用于浏览器的多片段快速加载的中文字库

  - 思源黑体: 仅包含简体的思源黑体，可提升加载速度
  - 参见:  https://github.com/adobe-fonts/source-han-sans

### 信息
  - version: Version 2.004;hotconv 1.0.118;makeotfexe 2.5.65603
  - familyName: Source Han Sans SC VF
  - subfamilyName: Regular
  - namedVariations: {"ExtraLight":{"wght":250},"Light":{"wght":300},"Normal":{"wght":350},"Regular":{"wght":400},"Medium":{"wght":500},"Bold":{"wght":700},"Heavy":{"wght":900}}
  - characterCount: 44812

### 使用
  - CDN 直接调用
    ```html
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/cn-fontsource-source-han-sans-sc-vf/font.css"></link>
    <style>
      html{
        font-family: Roboto, "Source Han Sans SC VF", sans-serif;
      }
    </style>
    ```
  - 本地化
    > npm i cn-fontsource-source-han-sans-sc-vf
    > 加载包中: font.css

##### 更多字体，支持请加星
> 浏览器可用免费中文字体搜集:  https://github.com/wc-ex/cn-fontsource
